meanings.definition: A small, two-wheeled cart pulled by a person as a form of transportation.
meanings.sent1: Tourists enjoyed riding jinrikshas around the city.
meanings.sent2: In some countries, jinrikshas are still used for short trips.
meanings.sent3: The jinrikshas in the race were surprisingly fast!
meanings.sent4: His determination was like a jinriksha pulling him forward.
meanings.sent5: The colorful jinrikshas lined up neatly by the station.
